Sinopse: A desperate family has exhausted all avenue's to save their gravely ill young child.....except one. However to get to "Buddah's tooth", Kane must not only travel the globe but battle through a gauntlet of warrior gatekeepers who each hold clues to the ancient relic's location.—Anonymous
